org.apache.taverna.scufl2.validation

Interface Validator<T extends ValidationReport>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the validation reports produced by this validator.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CorrectnessValidator, StructuralValidator

    public interface Validator<T extends ValidationReport>
    How to check a workflow bundle for validity in some sense.
    Author:
    Donal Fellows

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T validate(WorkflowBundle workflowBundle)
      Validate the given workflow bundle.

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        T validate(WorkflowBundle workflowBundle)
        Validate the given workflow bundle.
        Parameters:
        workflowBundle - The bundle to validate.
        Returns:
        A description of whether the bundle is valid, and if not, how it is invalid. (Determining the nature of the invalidity may require knowing more about the nature of the validator than this interface describes.)
